Author: passcombo.com 🏴☠🍋#0622
Content: after elections NN get some additional funding/preference in mining ?, is this funding decision  some way automatic based on votes during elections (some CC ?) or it's JL just assigning some special privileges to NN ? In the second case it's some way centralized -> elections are done but it only good will of JL to assign this privilege accordingly? or ?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the easy mining is coded into the blockchain rules. each NN is allowed to mine one easy diff block per 65 blocks. I have no control over who does and who doesnt

Author: passcombo.com 🏴☠🍋#0622
Content: ok so anyone can set the NN, so what is the election for ?

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
jl777c#5810
Content: the election is to select the NN

Author: passcombo.com 🏴☠🍋#0622
Content: I just do not understand part of it

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: only NN are able to do this

Author: passcombo.com 🏴☠🍋#0622
Content: but how exactly votes limit anyone from settin up his own NN ?

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: NNs mine KMD just like I do or any other miner does, just at a lower difficulty setting because their pubkey is coded into the sourcecode

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the pubkeys for the winners are put into the source code

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: simple, effective and very secure

Author: passcombo.com 🏴☠🍋#0622
Content: who sees the pub keys and who puts them ?

Author: passcombo.com 🏴☠🍋#0622
Content: only winners see them / are able to put into source code ?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: all candidates publish their pubkeys

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: after the election everybody knows what the winning pubkeys are

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: i make a list (more like given a list) and put it into the code

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: why is this so hard to understand?

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: every node and wallet running sees them, has a list of them, and enforces them

Author: passcombo.com 🏴☠🍋#0622
Content: ok , still it's based on good will of dev to put it into the code, of course anyone can verify it's good, but what would happen if JL was sick and could not do the code?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: then some other dev would

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: one of the easier changes to make
